title: Tumbler, 19th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Cylindrical, with fluted base and band of facetted diamonds. Decoration includes monogram, trophies, plants, flying cherub, altar and dog. Underside with eight-rayed rosette.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tumbler, 19th century.
19th century. Glass. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-41-2.
